main event: A civilian woman observed a shining object hovering near-by hills from the back porch of her house in Manitou Springs, Colorado on April 17, 1955. Subsequent investigation identified the object as the reflection from the wreckage of a silver aircraft in the same location.
interesting points: The sighting was of a shining object hovering near-by hills in the vicinity of an old rock quarry.
An Air Force aircraft flying over the area the next day identified the silver wreckage of an aircraft in the exact spot of the sighting.
The report card indicates that there were no photographs of the UFO sighting.
The conclusion was that the sighting was immediately identified as a reflection from aircraft wreckage, leading to no further investigation being authorized.
The form used for the report was the ATIC Form 329 (Revision 26 SEP 52).
